${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> SUCCESSFUL security cloud implementations point to significant savings Hello Sir/Madam,
Leverage lessons learned along the way to a successful security cloud and reduce the challenges of the architecture development process.
Read the use case “Security cloud for financial services <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T001XT_Security.Cloud.Financial.LP.html?did=d000000000an&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 10b-securitycloudforfinancialservicesusecase&utm_term=finance]]>” to learn how the Nokia overlay cloud solution has been successfully applied across multiple implementations. The use case reveals how you can:
- Provide security and compliance - Evolve in sync with the fastest moving environment - Reduce total cost of ownership (TCO) by at least 25 percent for your large enterprise cloud environment!
I hope that you enjoy this use case! Michael Williams
